uninstall_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to uninstall {0}?
uninstall_confirmation.details: Your save data will be deleted, and you will need a copy of the mod to install it again.

install.description_screenshots: Press S while playing to take a screenshot.

install_creation.title: Install DDLC
install_creation.description_mod: Click to browse for a mod.
install_creation.description_vanilla: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. The save data will be separate from any other copy of the game.
install_creation.description_vanilla_global_save: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. The save data will be shared with other copies of the game (e.g. Steam)
install_creation.description_modded: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed.  The save data will be separate from any other copy of the game.
install_creation.description_modded_global_save: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed.  The save data will be shared with other copies of the game (e.g. Steam)

section_backgrounds.title: Background
section_backgrounds.subtitle: Customise your copy of Doki Doki Mod Manager with one of these backgrounds.
section_backgrounds.description_credit: Original DDLC backgrounds courtesy of Team Salvato. Other backgrounds courtesy of reckonusm and famous1622.

section_storage.title: Storage Location
section_storage.subtitle: Change where your game data is stored.
section_storage.description_moving: Warning! If you choose to change your install location, all your mods, installations and save data will be moved. This may take several minutes, and cannot be interrupted.

section_discord.title: Discord Rich Presence
section_discord.subtitle: Share which mod you're playing with your Discord friends.
section_discord.description: Changes will take effect after restarting Doki Doki Mod Manager.

tab_about.title: About
tab_about.description: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a community-developed project that helps you find, install and play mods for Doki Doki Literature Club, a free Visual Novel game by Team Salvato.
tab_about.disclaimer_1: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a fan work of Doki Doki Literature Club and is not affiliated with Team Salvato. It is a fan work, as defined by Team Salvato's IP Guidelines.
tab_about.disclaimer_2: Doki Doki Mod Manager does not take responsibility for any damage caused to your files or computer, as a result of playing a mod or otherwise. It is up to you to ensure mods are safe to play.
tab_about.description_support: Doki Doki Mod Manager will always be free to download and use. If you like it and want to help me keep it updated, consider supporting me in one of the following ways.
tab_about.support_steelseries: Get 10% off SteelSeries gaming peripherals (affiliate link)
tab_about.support_code: Contribute to the project (code or translations)

move_install.title: Select new install folder
move_install.error_description: Check that you have permission and enough space to move to this folder.
